name: Meowing Point
description:
Point and meow. 3D hidden cat game. These creatures have been turned into stone. Find and save them all.

A short point and click exploration, with hints and references to my hometown in Australia.
Slight puzzling and extra hidden objects.
Relaxing with slight moody vibes.

Solo dev, 3d models, and art by me. Game made in Godot.
This game was made for a friend, you can play it too.

Working on additional free areas, secrets, and more polishing. This is my first game thank you.
